section.title: Smart Tools for Effortless Collaboration
section.subtitle: Create, submit, review, and track assignments seamlessly with your team.

features.title: Create Assignments
features.description: Easily create and organize coding or theory-based assignments. Add detailed instructions, attach resources, and set custom deadlines for individuals or groups.

features.title: Submit Work
features.description: Students can upload code files, documents, or written answers. The system supports multiple file formats and provides submission tracking with instant upload status.

features.title: Peer & Instructor Review
features.description: Enable detailed feedback through comments and peer reviews. Instructors and group members can evaluate assignments collaboratively, fostering teamwork and learning.

features.title: Grading & Performance Tracking
features.description: Assign marks, view performance analytics, and track progress over time. Students can monitor grades and see instructor feedback in one place.

features.title: Collaborative Group Spaces
features.description: Each assignment comes with a shared discussion area where team members can brainstorm, ask questions, and share ideas in real time.

features.title: Deadline Reminders & Notifications
features.description: Automatic reminders help keep students on track. Get notified about upcoming deadlines, new reviews, and updates instantly.
